item.description:
Hello all,

Military Whist is an easy social game that can be learned in 5 minutes. The cost is $5.00 and they have raffles and prizes. There are usually snacks and beverages. This is my church and this is also a fundraiser for the church. Hopefully a few of you can come out and enjoy the game. Afterwards we can come to my place and resume the merriment there. Also you can meetup at my place beforehand and we can walk over together.

I hope to see a few of you there.

Take care,

Margaret

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Military Whist
